mapper.select: SELECT `district_code` AS `districtCode`, `district` FROM `district_info` WHERE `district` LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') LIMIT #{offset}, #{records}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM `district_info` WHERE `district` LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')

SELECT a.`apt_id` AS 'aptId', a.`district_code` AS `districtCode`, d.`district`, a.`bunji`, a.`bonbun`, a.`bubun`, a.`apt_name` AS 'aptName', a.`build_year` AS 'buildYear', a.`road_name_address` AS 'roadNameAddress' FROM `apt_info` a JOIN `district_info` d ON a.`district_code` = d.`district_code` WHERE a.`district_code` = #{districtCode} LIMIT #{offset}, #{records}

SELECT d.`deal_id` AS 'dealId', d.`apt_id` AS 'aptId', a.`apt_name` AS 'aptName', d.`area`, d.`deal_year` AS 'dealYear', d.`deal_month` AS 'dealMonth', d.`deal_day` AS 'dealDay', d.`deal_amount` AS 'dealAmount', d.`floor` FROM `deal_info` d JOIN `apt_info` a ON d.`apt_id` = a.`apt_id` WHERE d.`apt_id` = #{aptId} ORDER BY d.`deal_year` DESC, d.`deal_month` DESC, d.`deal_day` DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{records}
SELECT `district_code` AS 'districtCode', `district` FROM `district_info` WHERE `hangul` LIKE CONCAT('%', #{hangul}, '%') LIMIT 0, 10
SELECT deal_year AS dealYear, avg(deal_amount) AS avgAmount, max(deal_amount) AS maxAmount, min(deal_amount) AS minAmount FROM deal_info WHERE apt_id = #{aptId} GROUP BY deal_year;
